attributes.action: bestow a knighthood on professor Richard Dawkins.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Professor Richard Dawkins is overdue this honour, assuming he hasn't refused it already, for his tireless quest to spread the word of atheism.
Once religion has shuffled off to the pages of fairy story history perhaps it will be a saner and more peaceful world.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
